ParticlesSystem

Class LineMagnet

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParticlesSystem.Magnet
      • ParticlesSystem.LineMagnet

  • public class LineMagnet
extends Magnet
    A line magnet is a magnet materialized by an infinite line.
